local_schema.longdesc: Setting this to FALSE means the pieces fall slowly, but gracefully. A setting of TRUE causes the pieces to fall quickly and jerkily.
The size of the board to use. 1 = Custom, 2 = Small, 3 = Medium, 4 = Large.
The filename of the theme to use.
Key press to drop a marble.
Key press to move right.
Key press to move left.
Whether or not to play event sounds.
Whether or not to use animation.
A number specifying the preferred theme.
Zero is human; one through three correspond to the level of the computer player.
Zero is human; one through three correspond to the level of the computer player.
Game preview from last saved session.
Game field from last saved session.
Game score from last saved session.
Time between moves in milliseconds.
Background color. The hex specification of the background color.
Ball style. The filename of the images to use for the balls.
ක්‍රිඩා කරන ක්‍ෂේත්‍රයේ ප්‍රමාණය. 1=කුඩා, 2=මධ්‍යම, 3=විශාල. වෙනත් අගයක් සාවද්‍යවේ.
The side of the board that is in the foreground, either 'white', 'black', 'current' (the current player) or 'human' (the side of the current human player)

local_schema.short_desc: The format to display moves in
local_schema.longdesc: The format to display moves in, can be either 'human' (human readable), 'lan' (long algebraic notation) or 'san' (standard algebraic notation)

local_schema.short_desc: The directory to open the load game dialog in
local_schema.longdesc: The directory to open the load game dialog in

local_schema.short_desc: The directory to open the save game dialog in
local_schema.longdesc: The directory to open the save game dialog in

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable the toolbar
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable the toolbar

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable the move history browser
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable the move history browser

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to show move comments
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to show move comments

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable board numbering
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable board numbering

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable move hints
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable move hints
A flag to enable 3D mode

local_schema.short_desc: The piece to promote pawns to
local_schema.longdesc: The piece to promote to when a human player moves a pawn to the far rank. Can be one of: 'queen', 'knight', 'rook', 'bishop'.

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable fullscreen mode
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable fullscreen mode

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to enable maximised mode
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to enable maximised mode
The height of the main window in pixels.
The width of the main window in pixels.

local_schema.short_desc: A flag to allow remote players to watch new games
local_schema.longdesc: A flag to allow remote players to watch new games

local_schema.short_desc: The amount of time each player has to move in new games
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time each player has to move in new games

local_schema.short_desc: The default player difficulty for black in new games
local_schema.longdesc: The default player difficulty for black in new games

local_schema.short_desc: The default player type for black in new games
local_schema.longdesc: The default player type for black in new games

local_schema.short_desc: The default player difficulty for white in new games
local_schema.longdesc: The default player difficulty for white in new games

local_schema.short_desc: The default player type for white in new games
local_schema.longdesc: The default player type for white in new games
මෑතකඳි තරග කළ තරග ලැයිස්තුව
A list of strings that come in the form of a quintuple: name, wins, total games played, best time (in seconds) and worst time (also in seconds). Unplayed games do not need to be represented.
The name of the scheme file containing the solitaire game to play.
Whether or not to play event sounds.
Select whether to drag the cards or to click on the source then the destination.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether or not to show the toolbar

local_schema.longdesc: The name of the file with the graphics for the cards.
The name of the key used to wait. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to teleport randomly. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to teleport safely (if possible). The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move south-east. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move south. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move south-west. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move east. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to hold still. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move west. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move north-east. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move north. The name is a standard X key name.
The name of the key used to move north-west. The name is a standard X key name.
Enable splats. Play a sound and show a "Splat!" on the screen.
Enable game sounds. Play sounds for various events throughout the game.
Use super safe moves. The player is alerted when there is no safe move and the only option is to teleport out.

Use safe moves. The safe moves option will help you to avoid being killed due to a mistake. If you try to make a move that would lead to your death when there is a safe move available you will not be allowed to proceed.
Game type. The name of the game variation to use.
Background color. The hex specification of the background color.
Robot image theme. The theme of the images to use for the robots.
Show toolbar. A standard option for toolbars.
Size of game tiles.
හඬ සක්‍රීය කරන්න.
Game level to start on.
Play levels in random order.
Enable fake bonuses.
තරගයේ වේගය (1=වේගවත්, 4=මන්දගාමී).
Number of AI players.
Number of human players.
Key to use for motion right.
Key to use for motion left.
Key to use for motion down.
Key to use for motion up.
Use relative movement (ie. left or right only).
Color to use for worm.

Use relative movement (ie. left or right only).

Key to use for motion up.
Use relative movement (ie. left or right only).
Color to use for worm.
Select whether to drag the tiles or to click on the source then the destination.
A flag to enable coloured tiles.

local_schema.short_desc: The size of the playing grid
local_schema.longdesc: The value of this key is used to decide the size of the playing grid. The valid values are 2 to 8, anything else gets set to 3.
Key press to pause.
Key press to rotate.
Key press to drop.
Key press to move down.
Key press to move right.
Key press to move left.
The density of blocks in rows filled at the start of the game. The value is between 0 (for no blocks) and 10 (for a completely filled row).

local_schema.short_desc: The number of rows to fill
local_schema.longdesc: The number of rows that are filled with random blocks at the start of the game.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether to rotate counter clock wise
local_schema.longdesc: Whether to rotate counter clock wise.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether to give blocks random colors
local_schema.longdesc: Whether to give blocks random colors.
Whether to provide a graphical representation of where a block will land.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether to preview the next block
local_schema.longdesc: Whether to preview the next block.
The background color, in a format gdk_color_parse understands.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether to use the background image
local_schema.longdesc: This selects whether or not to draw the background image over the background color.
Level to start with.

local_schema.short_desc: The theme used for rendering the blocks
local_schema.longdesc: The name of the theme used for rendering the blocks and the background.

local_schema.short_desc: Image to use for drawing blocks
local_schema.longdesc: Image to use for drawing blocks.
If set to true, a dump of the AI's working will be done to standard output.
Choose whether or not to insert a delay between the computer's dice rolls so the player can follow what it is doing.
The number of the puzzle being played.
Whether or not to play event sounds.
Set to true to have gnomine automatically flag squares as mined when enough squares are revealed
Set to true to enable warning icons when too many flags are placed.
Set to true to be able to mark squares as unknown.
පුවරුවේ ප්‍රමාණය (0-2 = කුඩා-විශාල, 3=රිසිකළ)

local_schema.short_desc: The number of mines in a custom game
Number of rows in a custom game
Number of columns in a custom game
Whether or not to show the toolbar
local_schema.longdesc: Whether or not to show the toolbar.

local_schema.short_desc: The amount of money in your bank
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of money in your bank.
The name of the file with the graphics for the cards.
Never take insurance with a dealer showing an ace.
Use a quick deal with no delay between each card.
Display the probabilities of each dealer hand outcome and the expected value of your hand.

local_schema.short_desc: The variation of the rules file to use
local_schema.longdesc: The name of the rules file containing the variation of the rules to play.
මාධ්‍ය ලිවිය යුතු පෙරනිමි වේගය.
